propertyDescriptor.name: ExtSchedulerUserGroupName
propertyDescriptor.description: The group name to be used for the set of users to display in the Scheduler app UserId combobox for creating new events.

propertyDescriptor.name: ExtSchedulerEventPeriodLength
propertyDescriptor.label: Event Period Length (minutes)
propertyDescriptor.description: Length in minutes for event period when creating a new event.

propertyDescriptor.name: ExtSchedulerEventFormColumns
propertyDescriptor.label: Event Form Columns
propertyDescriptor.description: A comma separated list of column names to display for the EventForm.js file. Column Names(Name,ResourceId,UserId,Alias,Quantity,Comments,StartDate,EndDate)

propertyDescriptor.name: ExtSchedulerAllowEventOverlap
propertyDescriptor.label: Event Overlap Allowed
propertyDescriptor.description: Set as true to allow for calendar events to overlap for a given resource. Defaults to false when blank.
